survey_response.review_text: The doctor is very gifted in his profession and was immediately able to accurately identify the problem (unlike all the other doctors I visited in the past , the issue was misdiagnosed). Very thankful to Dr Gopalkrishna 🙏🏻

review.practice_name: Dr. GK's Advanced Bone & Joints Clinic

survey_response.review_text:
I went to the doctor when my mom got a sudden extreme pain in her knees. It was almost midnight when I called the doctor. He was so caring that he asked us to come to his clinic, and by the time we reached, doctor also reached there and opened the clinic just for us. It was almost 1am, midnight. I've never seen such a perfect person with so much care for every single patient.
The doctor himself did an XRAY without asking us to go to an diagnostic center and treated my mom. With his treatment, my mom got well in 2 days. I wish God gives Dr. Gopal Krishna all happiness. He is a boon to the society. Thanks to him.

review.practice_name: Dr. GK's Advanced Bone & Joints Clinic

survey_response.review_text:
Excellent and new clinic, clean and posh. All COVID 19 precautions in place...Dr ** ************* *** explained health issue in detail. Have options of X-ray in next room so that’s again advantage to save time. 

X-ray technician is friendly and guide you while taking picture. Takes time and no rush at all. 

Overall I recommend this Dr and clinic 100%...

review.practice_name: Dr. GK's Advanced Bone & Joints Clinic

survey_response.review_text: Consulted Doctor GK for a very bad spasm in lower back. Doctor diagnosed the problem methodically.  Although found a slipped disc in MRI scan, he advised not to go for a surgery.  ** *********** ***********He is always to the point but he instilled confidence in me.

Dr Gopalkrishna is a very friendly doctor. He shows huge concern for the patient, sometimes at his own personal cost. He is not averse to your going in for a second or third opinions, upon his own advice. In fact, he facilitated and even accompanied me to one.

review.practice_name: Dr. GK's Advanced Bone & Joints Clinic

survey_response.review_text: Explained the problem in layman terms and premises was maintained very neatly and hygenically. Charges are reasonable.

I got both of my knees replaced by this doctor. I was afraid. But doctor counselled me very well n now 6 mths after surgery im independently doing almost all activities which i was not able to in last 5 years. Thank u vey much doctor

review.practice_name: Dr. GK's Advanced Bone & Joints Clinic

review_reply.reply_text:
Sir,  doctor tried helping you. Even when he was not available in the hospital because you requested sir, he obliged to give you a medical certificate from his clinic. And to tell you for a doctor attending  patients who come with some or other suffering is more important than giving a medical certificate for travel . ( Which you should have collected from front office clerk in the hospital)
The particular day when you sent a person to collect medical certificate, doctor had too many patients, inspite of that he requested his colleagues doctor to prepare certificate and he has sent you the same and at no extra cost for you.  
What else you expect from a Doctor.

survey_response.review_text: **** ****** *** **** ***** ********** *** i had a terrible experience visiting him.He deliberately made me wait for one single document for no reason *** **** ** ********* ****** If u r consulting him in an hospital , he will desperately ask u to come to his clinic instead.I had to come to my hometown for the treatment and after coming here I realised what a huge mistake I have done visiting him 😐.

********* * ********* *** *************.Doctor was patient in explaining my queries....Apart from this, I also took help from the Doctor on drop in Haemoglobin count iron deficiency.....This was also addressed with precision....& treatment.....not only this....Also, the life style & diet changes...

Dr Gopala Krishna , I can say a pioneer in orthopedic speciality , briefed with quality explanation , satisfied with his expertise.
I am not the resident of utrahalli but I urge upon all the residential societies of the area to visit such a doctor for any opinion and nevertheless people don't know actually what the services  at their door steps. 
Best regards 
Sheikh
Doctor clearly explained about process, procedures and required treatment. Felt relived after consultation as this issue was bothering me for a while.
**** **** ********* ** ***** ** ******* he very friendly in giving good suggestion to patient....
